reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, noting it's not scratchy or itchy, and appreciate its soft texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars FAVORITE. WARM AND SOFT!!
items.body: Love love love this top. Warm and cozy. Washes well. No shrinkage or fading. Wears well with jeans. Read more
items.author: Delores Davidge

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and stylish
items.body: True to size. Great quality sweater. The material is soft and comfortable. Got so many compliments. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Fit, Major Length Flaw for Larger Busts
items.body: This sweater is generally well-styled. However, there is a significant design flaw for larger-busted individuals. The bust pulls the fabric outward, which substantially reduces the overall vertical length of the top as most tops do for me. I intended to wear this with leggings and maintain modest coverage of the posterior/crotch area, but the result is insufficient length for modesty when worn over a larger bust. Additionally, the fabric material is a severe pet hair magnet. Pet hair easily becomes tightly woven into the material. This is not recommended for homes with animals/pets. Read more
items.author: Kristina Z.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy sweater
items.body: Really pretty sweater! Keeps it's shape. I put in washer but hung up to dry. Love it! Wear it a lot, soft and comfy. Read more
items.author: E Bean

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not true to size!
items.body: This was not an oversized/loose fit sweater. The XL fit like a tight L. Color was pretty. The pink is much brighter than the picture. The material felt cheap and probably wouldn’t hold up to very many washes. The material had an odd feel to it. Read more
items.author: Tammy B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Close to perfect for cool weather
items.body: This is a very nice lightweight sweater. I’d call it a So.California winter sweater. If is nearly perfect using the Amazon assistant. I wish it was a bit wider in the hips for a bit more oversized feel. If I order another I think I’ll size up. The shape is square and the knit tight and looks well made. Good value for the sale price I bought it at. For the reference of others I’m 5’2 150# 38” bust hips about the same. Bought a L. Read more
items.author: Jeaniem

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cozy feel
items.body: Love it. Bought three total in different colors. Warm and looks great with jeans or dress pants. Sleeves were a little long but after washing they are perfect. Read more
items.author: DiLo

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad odor
items.body: Opened this for the first time because the weather turned cold. It had a terrible odor and could not wear it. I’m surprised because I have ordered this brand before and was fine. I’m asking for a refund and return. I know it’s past the time allowed but I thought it would be ok. Read more
items.author: Kathy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Gray, Khaki, White, Beige, Blue, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
